name: survive-the-monsters
description: Welcome to the Web GameDev Challenge! In this exciting project, you'll embark on a journey to create a simple yet engaging RPG game using Phaser.js. Your mission is to develop a game where a hero must survive against waves of approaching monsters. If a monster touches the hero, the game ends, but don't worry, you can always restart and try to survive longer!
author: Kacper
